childMdx.excerpt: Who am I? A single drop of light, held in this loving eye. What is the world? The  endless  stream of water falling with me.   The way you…
Our being a part of this particular wave which carried us deep into the sacred forest where yellow woods speak in silence and God's primary…
The  balance  of flames backed by endless ocean and a single sentence from the Voice:   "The story is one of how much I loved."   Beyond…
